title: Corporate identity catalogue
content:
Just found the following and thought it might be of interest to you all:

[http://users.ncrvnet.nl/mstol/56.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026081640/http:/users.ncrvnet.nl/mstol/56.html "http://users.ncrvnet.nl/mstol/56.html")

Click on each name for a quick ID of typeface and pantone colours.

(Moderators feel free to re-locate this to the type ID board… I wasn’t sure which forum to post in.)

Andy

 [‹ a curiosity](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026081640/http:/typophile.com/node/21017 "Go to previous forum topic") [sans serif to combine with Plantin ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026081640/http:/typophile.com/node/43669 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 1985

comments.content:
Wow, this is pretty well organized. Nice find.

By the way, you posted this in the right place.
